We ended up looking as the evil guys here... With such a display, it's unlikely anyone will freely want to join the colony.
LanguageData.VME_FreethinkingSlaveEmancipation.stages: Our leader's speech was clear and succint, explaining all the evils of slavery in a concise way.
Our leader's speech was very inspiring, detailing all the evils caused by slavery and the immense advantages of a free society.
LanguageData.VME_LiberatingSlaveEmancipation.stages.0: Our leader's speech was a masterclass in extolling the virtues of a free society, liberated for the shackles of slavery.
LanguageData.VME_AmazingSlaveEmancipation.stages.0.de: Legends will be told about our leader's speech, and how those words will resonate in the future, elevating the cause of emancipation.
